Mailing Address: c/o Office of the Veteran's OmbudsmanPO Box 66Charlottetown, PE     C1A 7K2
Service Details: - Ensures the fair treatment of Veterans, their representatives, and their families through the provision of services, benefits, and support in a fair, accessible, and timely manner- Raises awareness of the needs and concerns of Veterans and their families- The Ombudsman is an impartial and independent officer, reporting directly to the Minister of Veterans Affairs Canada
